bill.title: Hospital Standards for Sexual Assault Victims; Emergency Contraception
bill.description: Adds a new part to chapter 321, HRS, to ensure that female victims of sexual assault are provided with medically and factually unbiased information about and access to emergency contraception when receiving emergency medical care at Hawaii's hospitals for sexual assault. Effective 07/01/2050. (SD2)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HTH/JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on HTH/JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-06-13 1:15PM in conference room 229.
The committee(s) on HTH deferred the measure until 02-11-13 2:00PM in conference room 229.
The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 02-12-13 9:30AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HTH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Baker, Chun Oakland, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Gabbard; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
Reported from HTH/JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 380) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-21-13 9:00AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Kouchi ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 657) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-05-13.

Floor amendment failed as amended (SD 3) following Roll Call vote: Ayes, 2. Noes, 23 (Senator(s) Baker, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Galuteria, Green, Hee, Ige, Ihara, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Kidani, Kim, Kouchi, Nishihara, Ruderman, Shimabukuro, Solomon, Taniguchi, L. Thielen, Tokuda, Wakai). Excused, 0 (none).
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 2 (Senator(s) Gabbard, Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
